title: Specimen
description: A Specimen is a physical sample, obtained for observation(s) normally carried out ex-situ, sometimes in a laboratory. - EXTENDS SAMPLING FEATURE - DONE HERE BY CLONING :-(

id.title: id
id.description: A unique identifier for the sampling feature

type.title: type
type.description: Identifies the type of sampling feature, which determines the type of the result property

sampledFeature.title: sampledFeature
sampledFeature.description: the feature which the sampling feature was designed to sample

relatedObservation.title: relatedObservation
relatedObservation.description: Observation that uses this sampling feature

complex.title: complex
complex.description: link to related sampling features - THIS SHOULD HAVE AN ARRAY OF VALUES

samplingTime.title: samplingTime
samplingTime.description: time the specimen was taken from the sampled feature

samplingMethod.title: samplingMethod
samplingMethod.description: Process used to take the specimen from the sampled feature.

samplingLocation.title: samplingLocation
samplingLocation.description: Location from which the specimen was taken within the sampled feature

currentLocation.title: currentLocation
currentLocation.description: Location where the specimen is currently

size.title: size
size.description: Physical extent of the specimen (length, mass, etc)
